LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Apo.label: apocalypse tank
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Apo.description: Heavy combat mechanoids that glide on dozens of tiny legs. Their heavy armor and firepower makes them very effective against bunched-up static defenders. They are somewhat vulnerable to mobile hit-and-run tactics.
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Apo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Rhino.label: rhino heavy tank
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Rhino.description: Heavy combat mechanoids that glide on dozens of tiny legs. Their thick carpace and firepower makes them very effective against bunched-up static defenders. They are somewhat vulnerable to mobile hit-and-run tactics.
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Rhino.tools.head.label: head
